name: Single Handedly Cooking with a Dragon
name_original: Single Handedly Cooking with a Dragon
description: EVERYTHING IS ON FIRE - AND THE DISHES ARE STILL DIRTY - *SMASH* - GLASS IS EVERWHERE, - MY HANDS ARE MADE OUT OF BUTTER This is a game made for the GMTK Game Jam 2020. The Theme was Out of Control. I hope you Enjoy this game!
